title: gweb1996
author: gweb1996
content: We are all f..ked, there are no biz opportunities...Any domain i f...king look i find big problems, sure you can start a green energy biz, but do you got 10-100 million dollars to invest in solar panels, wind power plants,hydro power plants etc ... ? Small biz is f..ucked , inflation will kill even most basic industries , salaries to low , inflation to high...energy should be nationalized, no other solution i see.
